game.name: Desolate Dusk
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 전용, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Desolate Dusk is a story-driven VR horror where survival hinges on your ability to adapt to new environments and locations. Explore and survive the quarantine zone using environmental objects like buttons, doors, and switches to fend off the unknown. Will you be able to survive?
